verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:34
verses.text: But Absalom fled. And the young man that kept the watch lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came much people by the way of the hill side behind him.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:35
verses.text: And Jonadab said unto the king, Behold, the king’s sons come: as thy servant said, so it is.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:36
verses.text: And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an end of speaking, that, behold, the king’s sons came, and lifted up their voice and wept: and the king also and all his servants wept very sore.
